text: The Football at the 2019 Summer Universiade in Naples will be played between 2 and 13 July. 24 football teams will participate in the tournament. ==Qualification== Following the FISU regulations, The maximum of 12 teams in football events where the number of entries is larger than the authorised participation level will be selected by * The entry and the payment of guarantee. * Those 6 teams finishing top rankings of the previous edition will be automatically qualified. * Those 3 teams finishing bottom rankings of the previous edition will be replaced by new applying teams. * The host is automatically qualified * The remaining teams will be selected by wild card system according to geographical, continental representation, FISU ranking and FIFA ranking. ===Qualified teams=== ====Men's competition==== {| class="wikitable" width=900 |- !width=25%|Means of qualification !width=27%|Date!!width=20%|Venue!!width=6%|Vacancies!!width=22%|Qualified |- |Host Country||style="text-align:center;"|—||style="text- align:center;"|—||style="text-align:center;"|1|| |- |Top five of previous edition||18–29 August 2017|| Taipei||style="text-align:center;"|5|| |- |Continental Quotas|| || Lausanne||style="text-align:center;"|4|| Ukraine |- |Wild card|| || Naples||style="text-align:center;"|2|| |- !colspan="3"|Total!!12!! |} ====Women's competition==== {| class="wikitable" width=900 |- !width=25%|Means of qualification !width=27%|Date!!width=20%|Venue!!width=6%|Vacancies!!width=22%|Qualified |- |Host Country||style="text-align:center;"|—||style="text- align:center;"|—||style="text-align:center;"|1|| |- |Top six of previous edition||17–28 August 2017|| Taipei||style="text-align:center;"|6|| |- |Continental Quotas|| || Lausanne||style="text-align:center;"|2|| |- |Wild card|| || Naples||style="text-align:center;"|3|| |- !colspan="3"|Total!!12!! |} ==Draw== Following the FISU regulations, draw of pool will be based on following by. * Previous Summer Universiade results * Participation in previous Summer Universiades * Continental representation * FIFA rankings ===Men's competition=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=33.33%| Pot 1 !width=33.33%| Pot 2 !width=33.33%| Pot 3 |- | (1) (2) (3) (4) | (5) (6) Ukraine (7) (8) | (9) (11) (12) (13) |} ===Women's competition=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=33.33%| Pot 1 !width=33.33%| Pot 2 !width=33.33%| Pot 3 |- | (1) (2) (3) (4) | (5) (6) (7) (8) | (10) (11) (12) (13) |} ==Pools composition== ===Men's competition=== {| class="wikitable" width=800 !width=25%|Pool A !width=25%|Pool B !width=25%|Pool C !width=25%|Pool D |- | | | | |- | | | | |- | | Ukraine | | |} ===Women's competition=== {| class="wikitable" width=800 !width=25%|Pool A !width=25%|Pool B !width=25%|Pool C !width=25%|Pool D |- | | | | |- | | | | |- | | | | |} ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== ===Medal events=== {| |- | Men | | | |- | Women | | | |} ==References== ==External links== *2019 Summer Universiade – Football *Results book (Archived version) 2019 U Category:2019 Summer Universiade events Universiade
